long_description: Equally ready for walking the dog, lounging fireside or stepping outside to get the paper, the UGG Ascot slippers offer a stylish and sophisticated exterior with a luxurious lining. Breathable and moisture-wicking sheepskin shearling linings let air circulate around feet in both warm and cool temperatures. UGG Ascot features reinforced heels and durable heavy stitching, providing extra protection in areas vulnerable to wear. Water-resistant molded rubber outsoles provide lightweight protection and support, keeping you cozy indoors and out.
short_description: Equally ready for walking the dog, lounging fireside or stepping outside to get the paper, the UGG Ascot slippers offer a stylish and sophisticated exterior with a luxurious lining.
